A woman is growing increasingly irritated with a male neighbour who harasses her every time she leaves the house.
She is not certain of which neighbour it is but she hears a man shout "damn" at her … [+1817 chars]

articles.author: Liz Scarlett
articles.title: Guns N' Roses announce huge 2023 world tour - Louder
articles.description: Guns N' Roses will be trekking across Europe and the US later this year for a mammoth world tour
articles.content:
Guns N’ Roses have announced a huge world tour which will see them headline  stadiums, festivals, and arenas across the summer and autumn.
